glosses: to suffer from a skin disease
H6879.def: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God

H2100.def: = process whereb liquids move freely as in a stream

H2931.def: = state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities

H7650.def: = action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

H423.def: = action by which the name of a deity is invoked and asked to punish a wrong-doer; ◄ contexts in which this may happen include: (1) covenants and agreements, where the deity is asked to punish those who do not obey the terms of the agreement, (2) cases  where a supposedly wrongful act has been committed, but where there is not enough certainty about the identity of the person who is responsible, and (3) in order to prevent people from committing a wrongful action, knowing that the deity's punishment will be upon them if they do so

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3409.def: = the upper part of the leg of humans and animals

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H990.def: = front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects

H6639.def: = state in which part of the human body has increased in size

70.gl: to be unable to bear children

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H779.def: = to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so

H4578.def: literally =  the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion

H543.def: = marker expressing a speaker's solemn confirmation of the truth of a statement

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H7068.def: = process by which humans or deities experience a sentiment of anger  for the sake of someone else, ◄ because that other person does not receive the attention, commitment, or treatment that they are entitled to

H5130.def: = action by which humans hold an object in their hands and move it to and fro, ► probably in order to signal to a deity that the object in their hands is intended for them

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H5352.def: literally: to be cleaned out; hence: = causative action by which a city is deprived of its inhabitants

H2232.def: = action by which humans scatter seeds or plant young plants in a field so that they may grow into a new crop; ≈ associated with the concept of investing in order to get a return; also associated with reproduction and perpetuation

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
